title: sarasvatyA bhagavatyA
sahitya:
sarasvatyA bhagavatyA samrakSitOham chAyAgaura tarayA varayA shrI


anupallavi

 virinci prANa nAyikayA vINAvAdanOtsukayA sarasa sangIta sAhitya stanadvayayA parAdvayayA


caraNam   catuSSaSTi kalAtmikayA samasta varNAtmikayAshruti pratipAditayA shubhra
vastrAvrtayAnatEndrAdyakhila dEvatayA nanda guruguha susEvitayA ratiramA girijArcitayA
ratnAbharaNAlankrtayAmati majjihvAgra sthitayA mangaLapradayA sadayayA
